claims.claim: Gudai-Darri mine will have 43 million tons annual capacity with 40+ year expected life
claims.quote: With an expected life of more than 40 years and an annual capacity of 43 million tons, Gudai-Darri will underpin future production of Rio Tinto's Pilbara Blend product.

claims.claim: Mine will increase iron ore production volumes and improve product mix from second half of the year
claims.quote: It's expected to increase iron ore production volumes and improve product mix from the Pilbara from the second half of this year.

claims.claim: Technology deployment makes the mine safer and more productive
claims.quote: Gudai-Darri's combination of data and analytics, machine learning and automation, will make this mine safer and more productive.

claims.claim: Construction phase supported over 3,000 jobs with 600 permanent operational roles
claims.quote: Development of the mine supported more than 3,000 jobs during the construction and design phase with the operation requiring around 600 permanent roles.

claims.claim: A$3.2 billion in goods and services sourced within Western Australia during construction
claims.quote: A total of A$3.2 billion ($2.2 billion U.S.) in goods and services were sourced within Western Australia (WA) during the construction phase

claims.claim: Solar farm will power one-third of operational needs with renewable energy
claims.quote: Once the new solar farm is complete, it will be able to power one-third of Gudai-Darri's operational needs with renewable energy.

claims.claim: Integrated planning approach extracted US$10 million of additional value
claims.quote: Farry said that the initial project had been successful, 'extracting around US$10 million ($13.47 million) of additional value.'

claims.claim: Koodaideri will deliver world-first performance by being safer, smarter and more productive than any other mine
claims.quote: Koodaideri will adopt many new processes and technologies and will deliver world first performance by being safe, smarter and more productive than any other mine.
